app_create:
```text
POST /apps HTTP/1.1
Authorization: Basic OmJlMDEyZWE3Yzc1MDgyNjllYjAxNzUxNDViMzMzY2Ex
Content-Type: application/json
```
```json
{
  "name": "my-app"
}
```

```text
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date: Tue, 23 Sep 2014 18:56:56 GMT
```
```json
{
  "id": "061ca454ab2f4df3981a9451ee95f282",
  "name": "my-app",
  "protected": false,
  "created_at": "2014-09-23T18:56:56.783417Z",
  "updated_at": "2014-09-23T18:56:56.783417Z"
}
```
